senses.sense: The 8<sup>th</sup> letter of the English alphabet, called aitch and written in the Latin script.
The ordinal number 8<sup>th</sup>, derived from this letter of the English alphabet, called aitch and written in the Latin script.
(science) Abbreviation of hour (particularly when used as a (non-SI) unit of time alongside International System of Units (SI) units)
(baseball, in statistics) Abbreviation of hit, the number of hits by a player
(stenoscript) Abbreviation of have and inflections having, had
